Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and bears traces of two incised Coptic characters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394125) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394125)
